parameters.name: Top
parameters.description: If true, then get the contour setting for the portion of the symbol above the horizontal line; if false, then get the contour setting for the portion of the symbol below the horizontal line

title: IWeldSymbol.GetContour
description: Gets the contour settings for this weld symbol.

parameters.name: Top
parameters.description: If true, then get the contour setting for the portion of the symbol above the horizontal line; if false, then get the contour setting for the portion of the symbol below the horizontal line

returns: Contour setting as defined by swWeldSymbolContourTypes_e
remarks:
To set the contour settings for a weld symbol, use
IWeldSymbol::SetText
.
